content: Hi, all. I can access individual files in a wasm component through WasiCtxBuilder.preopened_dir. Is it possible to give a component direct access (or something like it, perhaps by opening the file system root) to the filesystem? I'd like to allow the component to access arbitrary files.
Actually, I think I just figured it out. I had to use Unix-like paths with / as the separator in the component. Is that a indeed a requirement? I did not see that anywhere.

https://github.com/WebAssembly/wasi-filesystem/blob/e2a2ddc6cdcd9093d4bb5db0c44eb93d4c9c013b/wit/types.wit#L13 :slight_smile:
